```{r jazzpalg,echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE,message=FALSE,results="hide"}
library(greed)
library(future)
plan(multisession)
data("Jazz")
nbrun = 25
sol_h=list()
sol_h100=list()
sol_h50=list()
sol_seed=list()
sol_ms=list()
for (i in 1:nbrun){
  sol_h[[i]]=greed(Jazz,K=40)
  sol_h50[[i]]=greed(Jazz,K=40, alg=new("hybrid",pop_size=50))
  sol_h100[[i]]=greed(Jazz,K=40, alg=new("hybrid",pop_size=100))
  sol_seed[[i]]=greed(Jazz,K=40,alg=new("seed"))
  sol_ms[[i]]=greed(Jazz,K=40,alg=new("multistarts"))
}
```


```{r jazz,echo=FALSE, cache=TRUE,message=FALSE,results="hide",fig.width=5.5,fig.height=4.5}
  library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
  sH=tibble(icl=sapply(sol_h,function(s){s@icl}),alg="Hybrid (20)")
  sH50=tibble(icl=sapply(sol_h50,function(s){s@icl}),alg="Hybrid (50)")
  sH100=tibble(icl=sapply(sol_h100,function(s){s@icl}),alg="Hybrid (100)")
  sMs = tibble(icl=sapply(sol_ms,function(s){s@icl}),alg="Multistart")
  sSeed = tibble(icl=sapply(sol_seed,function(s){s@icl}),alg="Seed")
  gg=sH%>%bind_rows(sMs)%>%bind_rows(sSeed)%>%bind_rows(sH100) %>%bind_rows(sH50) %>% mutate(alg=factor(alg,levels = c("Multistart","Seed","Hybrid (20)","Hybrid (50)","Hybrid (100)")))
  ggplot(gg)+geom_boxplot(aes(x=alg,group=alg,y=icl))+geom_point(aes(x=alg,y=icl))+xlab("")+ylab("ICL")+theme_bw()+ggtitle("Jazz musician network")


```
